results.details: Expected email_automation intent, got check_inbox

response_data.message: Check my Gmail inbox for user john@company.com
response_data.response:
I'd be happy to help you with that! As Elva AI, I can access your Gmail inbox and provide you with an update on the latest emails from user john@company.com.

Please note that I'll need your permission to access your Gmail account. If you're comfortable with that, I can proceed with checking your inbox.

Once I've accessed your inbox, I'll provide you with a summary of the emails from john@company.com, including the subject lines, senders, and any relevant details.

Please confirm if you'd like me to proceed with checking your inbox.
